settings.text:
I am Ioja Andreea-Cristina – therapist, massage technician, and healthcare professional. I have chosen to dedicate my life to a deep understanding of the human being and healing in all its forms – physical, emotional, and energetic.
Everything started from a sincere desire to help others. I embarked on a path full of studies, training, and experience in the medical field, alternative therapies, massage, and communication. Each step brought me closer to who I am today: a person who offers, from the heart, care, balance, and presence.
This is how my cosmetic brand was born – a dream turned into reality, created with gentleness, passion, and respect for nature and authentic beauty.
Every product tells a story and is carefully formulated so that you feel good in your skin – every single day.
Welcome to this space where science intertwines with the soul, and beauty begins with love."
